titleStmt.title: A perfect & exact account of all the holy-daies in the yeare, together, with the reasons why they were set apart as festivals by the Church.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for I. Stafford, and F. Coles, and are to be sold at their shops near the White-Hart in Smithfield, and at the half-Bowle in the Old-Bailey,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: their shops near the White-Hart in Smithfield
